notes: This file configures the hidden VM trigger and QEMU settings.
Use '.' as the decimal separator in the expression.
Set qemu.qemuPath to qemu-system-x86_64.exe and qemu.qemuImgPath to qemu-img.exe.
Disk is persistent. Keep isoPath to install the OS; remove it later to boot from disk only.
bootOrder default is c,d so it tries disk first, then ISO if the disk is empty.
